com.rohitsood.urlybird.client.gui.widget.textfield.listener
Class CommonTextFieldFocusListener

java.lang.Object
  com.rohitsood.urlybird.client.gui.widget.textfield.listener.CommonTextFieldFocusListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener
public class CommonTextFieldFocusListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener

The focus listener that provides call backs into the CommonTextField. Detects focus events and calls appropriate methods on the text field.

Version:
1.3
Author:
Rohit Sood

          The textfield to call when events trigger.
